author: blogs.wsj.com
title: Real Time Economics: Yields Up, Stocks Down | Trump Sending Trade Delegation to Beijing | Got A2 Milk?
text: This is the web version of the WSJ’s daily economic newsletter. You can sign up for daily delivery here. Good morning! Today we look at rising bond yields and company profit warnings, Trump’s outreach to China, French President Macron’s visit to Washington, the European Central Bank’s meeting this week, and corporate response to consumer demand for milk Inflation, the Economy and Treasury Yields | Mr. Macron Goes to Washington | $25K Bonuses on the Railroad Next Q&A: How an Economist Unlocked Hidden Truths About School Choice
